Who became the first Asian woman to win Best Actress at the Oscars?
Michelle Yeoh
For which movie did Michelle Yeoh win the Best Actress Oscar?
Everything Everywhere All At Once
What other award did the movie win at the Oscars?
Best Picture
To whom did Michelle Yeoh dedicate her award?
Her 84-year-old mother
Where was Michelle Yeoh's mother watching the show?
Malaysia
Who were the directors of Everything Everywhere All At Once?
Daniel Kwan and Daniel Scheinert
How many Oscars did the film win in total?
Seven
Who presented Michelle Yeoh's Oscar?
Jessica Chastain and Halle Berry
What was Halle Berry's significance in the Best Actress category?
She was the first Black woman to win in the category
Which other awards did Michelle Yeoh win this awards season for her performance?
A Golden Globe and a SAG award
